actions.text: Amendment SA 366 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 366 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator McCaskill. (consideation: CR S2292-2296; text: CR S2292) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to support the transition of servicemembers to the civilian workforce by streamlining the process associated with Federal and State credentialing requirements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 366 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 366 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator McCaskill.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to support the transition of servicemembers to the civilian workforce by streamlining the process associated with Federal and State credentialing requirements.
